channel.title: Broken "Black Mesa general FAQ" Link
channel.description:
Amazing work guys!
I just wanted to report a broken link..
Click on "Black Mesa" subforum. [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/forumdisplay.php?f=1[/url] Click "Black Mesa general FAQ". [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/forumdisplay.php?f=31[/url] redirects to [url]https://www.wiki.blackmesasource.com/General_FAQ[/url] (broken) instead of [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/General_FAQ[/url]
I'm seeing the problem on both Chrome and Safari.

item.title: Broken "Black Mesa general FAQ" Link
item.dc:creator: Skitch
item.description:
Amazing work guys!

I just wanted to report a broken link…

Click on “Black Mesa” subforum.
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/forumdisplay.php?f=1
Click “Black Mesa general FAQ”. https://forums.blackmesasource.com/forumdisplay.php?f=31 redirects to https://www.wiki.blackmesasource.com/General_FAQ (broken) instead of https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/General_FAQ

I’m seeing the problem on both Chrome and Safari.

Read full topic
